verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man מַה־ <WH4100> how יִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become עֵץ־ <WH6086> tree הַגֶּ֖פֶן <WH1612> What is the vine מִכָּל־ <WH3605> any עֵ֑ץ <WH6086> more than any tree הַזְּמוֹרָ֕ה <WH2156> [or than] a branch אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> is among בַּעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> which is among the trees הַיָּֽעַר׃ <WH3293> comb

הֲיֻקַּ֤ח <WH3947> be taken מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> Can עֵ֔ץ <WH6086> Shall wood לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> thereof to do לִמְלָאכָ֑ה <WH4399> anything אִם־ <WH518> or יִקְח֤וּ <WH3947> can take מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> at יָתֵ֔ד <WH3489> a pin לִתְל֥וֹת <WH8518> of it to hang עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> any כֶּֽלִי׃ <WH3627> any vessel

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> If לָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> into the fire נִתַּ֣ן <WH5414> Behold it is cast לְאָכְלָ֑ה <WH402> for fuel אֵת֩ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> both קְצוֹתָ֜יו <WH7098> the ends אָכְלָ֤ה <WH398> devoureth הָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> the fire וְתוֹכ֣וֹ <WH8432> of it and the midst נָחָ֔ר <WH2787> of it is burned הֲיִצְלַ֖ח <WH6743> Is it meet לִמְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> business

הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold בִּֽהְיוֹת֣וֹ <WH1961> become תָמִ֔ים <WH8549> Behold when it was whole לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not יֵֽעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> it was meet לִמְלָאכָ֑ה <WH4399> for no work אַ֣ף <WH637> How כִּי־ <WH3588> when אֵ֤שׁ <WH784> when the fire אֲכָלַ֙תְהוּ֙ <WH398> hath devoured וַיֵּחָ֔ר <WH2787> it and it is burned וְנַעֲשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> how much less shall it be meet ע֖וֹד <WH5750> still לִמְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> yet for [any] work ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עֵץ־ <WH6086> tree הַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <WH1612> As the vine בְּעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> among the trees הַיַּ֔עַר <WH3293> of the forest אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נְתַתִּ֥יו <WH5414> which I have given לָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> to the fire לְאָכְלָ֑ה <WH402> for fuel כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so נָתַ֔תִּי <WH5414> so will I give אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> And I will set אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנַי֙ <WH6440> my face בָּהֶ֔ם מֵהָאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> from [one] fire יָצָ֔אוּ <WH3318> against them they shall go out וְהָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> and [another] fire תֹּֽאכְלֵ֑ם <WH398> shall devour וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> them and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God בְּשׂוּמִ֥י <WH7760> when I set אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> my face בָּהֶֽם׃

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> And I will make אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land שְׁמָמָ֑ה <WH8077> desolate יַ֚עַן <WH3282> because מָ֣עֲלוּ <WH4603> because they have committed מַ֔עַל <WH4604> a trespass נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
